value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports in a Day - 20: Beyond Report Development - Part 1
value.excerpt: In this video, we describe how to publish reports to the Power BI service, and also cover consuming, delivering, and embedding paginated reports. In this video Daniel teaches us how to use the Best Practice Analyzer.    The Best Practice Analyzer can review your model for code errors, or common
